meanings.sent1: The gridded paper helped me draw straight lines.
meanings.sent2: The city streets were gridded neatly, making navigation easy.
meanings.sent3: The gridded cake looked like a delicious math problem.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gridded map, each thought neatly organized.
meanings.sent5: The gridded fabric created a sense of order and precision.

meanings.definition: Divided into or organized in a grid pattern
meanings.sent1: The gridded map showed the different sections of the park.
meanings.sent2: The gridded spreadsheet made it easy to track expenses.
meanings.sent3: The gridded garden beds resembled a patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent4: His gridded schedule kept his day structured and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The gridded floor tiles gave the room a modern and organized look.
